title: Russia, Gaza, tariffs: What Americans think of Trump's foreign policy
shortDescription: Donald Trump has pursued a very different foreign policy than his predecessor, Joe Biden. Three months in, here's what Americans think of that.

title: Trump claimed victory on deportations. But so did ACLU. What to know
shortDescription: The Supreme Court tossed out an order blocking the Trump administration from deporting migrants under the Alien Enemies Act. Here's what to know.

title: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott announces a Nov. 4 special election date
shortDescription: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott said that a special election to fill the U.S. House seat left vacant by late Rep. Sylvester Turner will take place on Nov. 4.

title: Trump to sign executive order aimed at revitalizing coal industry
shortDescription: President Trump will sign an executive order boosting the coal industry by rolling back efforts to curb a source of energy that's a major pollutant.

title: Foreign Service union representing 18,000 workers sues Trump
shortDescription: The American Foreign Service Association alleged Trump broke the law when he unilaterally ended collective bargaining for national security agencies.

title: Judge won't toss Trump deportation case after Supreme Court action
shortDescription: The Supreme Court lifted District Judge James Boasberg's temporary ban on deportations under the Alien Enemies Act.

title: Trump touts progress on trade deals with South Korea, other countries
shortDescription: President Trump said he opened trade negotiations with South Korea among the many countries that “want to make a deal with the United States.”

title: Musk slams top Trump trade adviser Peter Navarro as tariffs divide GOP
shortDescription: A pair of Donald Trump's top advisers are at odds. Elon Musk called Peter Navarro a "moron" and "dumber than a sack of bricks."

title: National forests face the hatchet as Trump admin boosts logging
shortDescription: A new policy opens 58% of U.S. national forests to logging by rolling back environmental protections.

title: Trump tariffs on China set to rise to 104% Wednesday, White House says
shortDescription: China has remained defiant in the escalating trade war. Trump advisers say other countries are lining up to negotiate deals.

title: Trump plans to fine migrants $998 a day for failing to leave after deportation order
shortDescription: The Trump administration plans to fine migrants under deportation orders up to $998 a day if they fail to leave the U.S., according to documents reviewed by Reuters.

title: South Korea sets snap presidential election for June 3
shortDescription: Leading contenders began to throw their hats in the ring on Tuesday as South Korea officially set June 3 for a snap presidential election triggered by last week's removal from office of impeached leader Yoon Suk Yeol.

title: America's capital city in the crosshairs of GOP leadership
shortDescription: Trump wants the city cleaned up. Congress is holding $1 billion in DC taxes in limbo. Residents just want a say.

title: Democrats target House Republicans from swing states, red districts
shortDescription: Democrats hope to flip the House by capitalizing on their base's frustration with President Donald Trump.

title: China vows to 'fight to the end' after Trump's 104% tariff warning
shortDescription: Tensions between the world's two major powers rose after President Donald Trump threatened China with additional tax levies that would add up to 104%.

title: Trump administration fires admiral amid purge of senior brass
shortDescription: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has derided diversity programs in the military and has fired senior officers linked to them.

title: 'I love that': Trump on sending American prisoners to El Salvador
shortDescription: Trump told reporters he would be in favor of sending American prisoners to El Salvador Sunday but that he doesn't "know what the law says on that."
